entry.title: Decentralizing ming
entry.summary: In a conversation between Jeff Garzik and slush in 2014, Garzik noted that Satoshi Nakamoto appeared to be displeased with the early emergence of GPU mining pools. However, slush pointed out that Satoshi had left the project before mining pools gained traction. It was suggested that he projected to see the trend. Jeff Garzik is a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist at BitPay Inc.
